mapper.update: MERGE INTO CART_TBL USING DUAL ON ( PRO_NUM = #{pro_num} AND USER_ID = #{user_id} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BUY_COUNT = BUY_COUNT + #{buy_count} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CART_CD, PRO_NUM, USER_ID, BUY_COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART_CD.NEXTVAL, #{pro_num}, #{user_id}, #{buy_count})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CD, C.USER_ID, P.PRO_NUM, P.PRO_NM, P.PRO_MAIN_IMG, C.BUY_COUNT, P.PRO_PRICE-(P.PRO_PRICE*(P.PRO_DISCOUNT/100)) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_TBL P INNER JOIN CART_TBL C ON P.PRO_NUM = C.PRO_NUM AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY C.CART_CD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_TBL WHERE CART_CD IN (${cart_cd})
